de.targodan.usb.data

Class Rat

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • de.targodan.usb.data.User
        • de.targodan.usb.data.Rat

  • public class Rat
extends User
    Rat is a User with additional information about the jumps called and if they have been assigned to a case.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean assigned 
      protected int jumps 
      protected java.util.Set<Report> reports

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rat(java.lang.String ircName)
      Construct a Rat with only an IRC name and the platform guessed based on the IRC name.
      Rat(java.lang.String ircName, java.lang.String cmdrName)
      Construct a Rat with an IRC name and a commander name, the platform is guessed based on the IRC name.
      Rat(java.lang.String ircName, java.lang.String cmdrName, Platform platform)
      Construct a Rat with an IRC name, a commander name and the platform.
